exceptions.tactic: apply Build_SeparationAlgebra with (fun m1 m2 m => J (option worlds) (option_join J m1 m2 m)).
exceptions.exn: In environment worlds : Type J : Join worlds SA : SeparationAlgebra worlds m1 : ?T m2 : ?T0 m : ?T1 The term "option worlds" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "worlds".

original: apply Build_SeparationAlgebra with (fun m1 m2 m => J (option worlds) (option_join J m1 m2 m)). - intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2. destruct (join m1 m2 m) as [J1 | J2]. + exists J2. split. * apply (option_join J). apply J2. * apply H2. + exists J2. split. * apply H1. * apply (option_join J). apply J2.
